Hi Steven,
I'm just back from a trip to Arizona.  There wasn't time for a new tsuba kantei before I left, but I will put one together soon.

Jim 



  Greetings all,

  Just thinking that it would be nice to tackle a new kantei problem about now...!  I've very 
  much enjoyed these, and it's been great to see the thoughts everyone has shared in 
  considering each of the pieces reviewed thus far.  A terrific learning experience, plus we 
  get to see some super tsuba...  So, just a gentle nudge here hoping to stir the kantei 
  spirits!  

  Steven
